ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file from SFTP server  to Microsoft SQL database INSERT
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will take the content of a JSON file. JSON will be used to create a INSERT statement and executed to Microsoft SQL database.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/example/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path for the input Json file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"contacts.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the input Json file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address where input Json file is located."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"contacts\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Database table into which the data will be inserted."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for the Microsoft SQL database."}}
